properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 3 at 9:00AM CST until January 7 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in
Kentucky...

Green River at Paradise

.This is an updated forecast to reflect timing changes associated
with the fall of the river below flood stage next week.

Previous Discussion...River levels continue to remain elevated
for the Green River at Paradise as water from this past week's
rainfall continues to be routed through the river basin. The
river will fall below flood stage early next week.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Green River at Paradise.
* until Tuesday morning.
* At  8:15 AM Friday the stage was 383.4 feet.
* Flood Stage is 380.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue to slowly fall to below flood
stage by early Tuesday morning, January 7th.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
